title: Caught booster in PLAT Elo
body:
So obviously i cannot declare the name of that particular kkunt, bcoz of sh!!!!tty rules of RIOT boards but this guy was Bronze last season and suddenly in Plat promos out of no where, at 1st i thought he might be smurf  and just want to climb his smurf but, when i check this guy KDA on Season 6 champs it is really bad compare to KDA of some champion of Season 7.

Not only this but this guy duo with one person who is currently Gold 4 soon to be Gold 3, i don't understand this duo guy, as he is gold from Season 5 but most of champs his KDA is bronze while few champs his KDA is beyond GOD stats, like very high division, i am guessing this guy do account sharing or something as s5,s6 sup main suddenly playing s7 adc with god like stats i don't get it.


Ps: Even after submitting  ticket nothing will change #RIOT cant investigate any Sh!!t properly, luckily we won game bcoz i mention at the beginning of this game that these 2 players are fishy either boosting or account sharing. Hope you guys don't have to see them in future, and sorry for my bad English lol

Peace out

replies.body: A lot of people do bronze to Diamond accounts.
